title: Maximize utility with more pencils, less pads

content.question: If the marginal utility of the 30th pencil is 100 utils and the marginal utility of the 10th pad is 400 utils, to maximize utility the student should change her purchases of pencils and pads in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Pencils Pads Not change Buy more
Pencils Pads Buy more Buy more
Pencils Pads Buy more Buy less
Pencils Pads Buy less Buy more
Pencils Pads Buy less Buy less

content.answer: Pencils Pads Buy more Buy less

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
